content: Are you fluent in both Vietnamese, and English, and familiar with the FHIR specification and community? ADB (Asian Development Bank) are looking for someone to initiate the development of a FHIR community and supporting tooling in Vietnam. This would be for at least 6 months in Vietnam starting ASAP, and would include travelling to HL7 meetings. If you're interested, contact Donna Medeiros at donnamedeiros123@gmail.com
